is so excited to be a part of Fox! Some of his favorite AHP roles are Henry (Funny Money), Bellhop (Lend Me a Tenor), Bassinet (The Ladies Man). He has been heavily involved in community theatre for the past 9 years and sits on the Greensburg Civic Board. He has had a blast working with his friends on this show and can’t think of a better way to spend two months! “Thank you, Ron, not only for this opportunity, but for many over the years. Sue, you are a fantastic Stage Manager. Cast mates, you made this a truly enjoyable experience. Special thanks to my family (especially my father), my friends, and most of all……YOU!”
